name: Article Schema Structured Data
approach: Implement Article schema using JSON-LD format in the document head. Include all required and recommended properties: headline, author, datePublished, dateModified, image (multiple sizes), publisher with logo, description, and mainEntityOfPage. Use BlogPosting for blog posts or NewsArticle for news content.
rationale: Article schema helps search engines understand content type, authorship, and publication details. This enables rich results in search including author bylines, publication dates, and thumbnail images, which can improve click-through rates by 20-30%.
success_indicators: JSON-LD is valid (test with Google Rich Results Test)
All required properties are present (headline, author, datePublished, image, publisher)
Image array includes multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 4:3, 16:9)
dateModified is updated when content changes
URL in mainEntityOfPage matches canonical URL
